name: One Flag: A 2D Puzzle-Platformer
description:
Help a little blue pill liberate their homeland one flag at a time, in this puzzle-platformer that is all about turning the elements of the level in your favor.

FEATURING


  • 20 levels of increasing difficulty that will test both your puzzle-solving and platforming skills
  • Discover new tools as you progress, and learn how to use them to reach your goals
  • Simple and accessible controls; it's all about using what's available in each unique challenge
  • Test your mastery with Time-Attack mode; beat every level under a strict time limit for a rare achievement
